query.sql:
INSERT INTO stock_zj( create_time,stock_code,gd_name,notice_date,trade_start,trade_end,sc,trade_quantity,trade_type,trade_lt_ratio,trade_zg_ratio,z_quantity,zg_ratio,lt_quantity,lt_ratio ) VALUES( now(), [ stock_code ] , [ gd_name ] , [ notice_date ] , [ trade_start ] , [ trade_end ] , [ sc ] , [ trade_quantity ] , [ trade_type ] , [ trade_lt_ratio ] , [ trade_zg_ratio ] , [ z_quantity ] , [ zg_ratio ] , [ lt_quantity ] , [ lt_ratio ] )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE create_time=now()
